server_message: Server maintenance break. Please be patient.
update_message:
- Error fixed while downloading in Android 10.
- Added Downloader switch in settings which can be used if you are facing crash or lag while downloading projects.
- Improved design in project page and profile edit activity (better design is coming for v3.0)
- Integrated inbuilt file picker which now allows you to preview the images.
- Sketchub was replacing projects when Sketchware project id reaches 1000 (fixed)
- The profile picture was not updating due to cache problem (fixed)
